text: “Gei dolomeenei, digau aanei, i mua nnadumada o Dimaadua mo i mua tagabuli damana nei o digau Israel huogodoo, go nia daangada o Dimaadua, au e helekai adu gi goodou gi hagalongo gii donu gi nia mee huogodoo Dimaadua go tadau God, ala gu hagawaalanga mai gi gidaadou bolo gi heia, gi duudagi gi muli di godou kae tenua humalia deenei, gei goodou gaa higi labelaa gi muli gi godou madahaanau ala ga kila aga i godou muli, ga hana hua beelaa.”
